name: Snow Mountain Sniper Shooting
description:
This is very unique addictive nonstop with thrill very smooth great control and powerful shooting game. Are you sure to be a super sniper shooter fans? If yes; Snow Mountain Sniper Shooting here given you an opportunity to become a professional shooter with sniper guns. Ultimate army commando shooting game gives an exciting experience to complete the mission. You have to be very sharp because these enemies’ are very dangerous. Commando you need to use your sniper shooting skills to shoot and kill enemies.

Be the best commando and fight as sharp sniper shooter, send the enemy and terrorists to hell. Aim and Shoot! Left no commando mate behind in this action oriented first person shooter game. Arm yourself with deadly sniper guns, assault rifles, machine guns and the latest military gear to complete covert combat missions deep inside enemy region!

How to play:
• Enter in the game area
• Click on start button to fight against gangster
• Tap on fire button to shoot enemies
FEATURES:
• Play this 3D game simply and easily
• Realistic sniper shooting adventure
• Realistic battle city environment
• Stunning HD graphics
• Complete action sniper game
• Multiple challenging missions
• Really enjoyable for FPS war fighters
• Get more points to make high score in limited time
